snippet: Rupert Murdoch took a contrite tone and listed steps taken at the News Corporation since it was engulfed in scandal last year.
abstract: Rupert Murdoch faces News Corporation shareholders at the company's annual meeting, at which proposals for management changes are shot down for second year in a row; all 14 of the company's proposed board members are elected; company defeats efforts to eliminate the News Corporation's dual-stock structure that ensures Murdoch family control; Murdoch is both chairman and chief executive of the $59 billion media and entertainment conglomerate.
lead_paragraph: Rupert Murdoch took a contrite tone and listed steps taken at the News Corporation since it was engulfed in scandal last year.

headline.main: Murdoch Hears Critics as His Board Wins Election
headline.print_headline: Murdoch Hears Critics As His Board Wins Election
